documents.document: Short day doing mostly black runs after the overnight snow. Legs are now b*ggered!
I covered 10,669 vertical feet, rode 7 chairlifts, and earned 1 pin @pcski using @EpicMix. https://t.co/tTC1TDbc4K
I earned the High Roller Pin at @pcski on @EpicMix. See it and all my other pins at https://t.co/Sgn5qXAYQ6

@canberratimes Jeez, that was a looong article. Got bored part way through...& I'm a bean counter!
I covered 20,958 vertical feet, rode 15 chairlifts, and earned 0 pins @pcski using @EpicMix. https://t.co/3fE4s4NvwA
@normallycomplex @abccanberra @MRAACT I was being polite & constructive & you finish up with an insulting generalisation like that *sigh*
@normallycomplex @abccanberra @MRAACT I think we need to agree to disagree on this!
@normallycomplex @abccanberra @MRAACT Of course it does! Good lane positioning and buffering are fundamental skills to keep a rider safer.
@normallycomplex @abccanberra @MRAACT True, but the consequences are much worse for a rider.
@normallycomplex @abccanberra @MRAACT It's about avoiding something like this https://t.co/P8BGZEuAkw
@normallycomplex @abccanberra I take it you haven't travelled asking Hindmarsh Drive in the rush hour recently, then!
@normallycomplex @abccanberra There are studies that prove otherwise: https://t.co/n8frq8BCK1

US food. Burgers outstanding (sorry Aus burger-with-the-lot). Mac n cheese euww. Why are mains called entrés? Large glasses of water yay!

Public bathroom gripe #2: hand driers or towel dispensers requiring wrists to be held higher than elbows. Soapy jumper sleaves, anyone?
Public bathroom gripe #1: lots of room in the hand washing area, only 4" max between door & pan edges. Here's hoping no one dribbled.

Day 2 in Lincoln: so much to see! Toured cathedral, visited Museum of Lincoln Life, saw a windmill & walked down Steep Hill. Which is. Very.
